name: multi_variable_20
description: Test stateful management of 20 variables with diverse types.

turns.query: I'm documenting our startup TechStart. We're in the Software industry, led by CEO Alice Johnson, headquartered in San Francisco. We have 50 employees, founded in 2020, 1 office, 2 products. Revenue is $5M with 10% profit margin, not public yet so no stock price or market cap. We're profitable and hiring but not international yet. Departments are Engineering, Sales, and Marketing. Only location is SF. We've raised $10M in Series A funding. Contact info is info@techstart.com and phone 555-0100.

Big growth update! We've tripled our team to 150 employees, expanded to 3 offices with 5 products. Revenue hit $15M and profit margin improved to 15%. We've gone international! Added HR and Finance departments. New offices in NYC and London. Add our $100M valuation to financials and a support line 555-0200 to contacts.

We're going public! Add 'Inc.' to our company name, we're now 'Enterprise Software'. Team grew to 500 employees, 10 offices, 10 products. Revenue $50M, 20% margin. Stock price launches at $25, market cap $500M. We're now public! Added Legal and IR departments, expanded to Tokyo and Berlin. Record the IPO in financials, add IR contact ir@techstart.com.

Documenting MegaCorp for our records. They're a Conglomerate run by CEO Bob Williams, based in New York. 10,000 employees, founded in 1990, 50 offices worldwide, 100 products. $1B revenue, 12% profit margin. Stock at $150, market cap $50B. They're public, profitable, not currently hiring, and very international. Has all departments, global presence. Debt of $500M and assets of $2B. IR contact is ir@megacorp.com.

MegaCorp is undergoing major restructuring. They're pivoting to Technology sector with new CEO Carol Lee. Reducing to 8,000 employees, 30 offices, focusing on 50 core products. Revenue down to $800M but margin improved to 18%. Stock rose to $180, market cap $60B. Now hiring again. Reorganized into Tech, Cloud, and AI departments. Consolidated to Americas, Europe, and Asia regions. Paid down debt to $200M, assets grew to $2.5B. Added press contact press@megacorp.com.

MegaCorp just completed a major acquisition! Add 'Global' to the company name. Workforce expanded to 12,000 employees, 45 offices, 75 products now. Revenue up to $1.2B, margin at 15%. Stock hit $200, market cap $80B. Added an 'Acquired' department for the new team. Expanded to Australia. Record the $500M acquisition in financials, add M&A contact ma@megacorp.com.
